1.title: Bob Saget

episode of.title: The Pauly Shore Podcast Show (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Pauly sits down with American family man and famed potty mouth Bob Saget to discuss everything from his start at the Comedy Store as a fast-talking guitar comic, to his current relationships with the Olsen twins and his man love for John Stamos.

2.title: Judd Apatow

episode of.title: The Pauly Shore Podcast Show (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Judd Apatow stops by the Pauly Shore podcast to talk about his early beginning in comedy working for Pauly Shore's dad, why he gave up stand-up for writing and why he's excited to bring Pee Wee Herman back to the big screen.

3.title: Harland Williams

episode of.title: The Pauly Shore Podcast Show (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Pauly chats with the very funny Harland Williams, who shares his humble comedy beginnings, his memorable roles on TV and film, and why he doesn't come to the Comedy Store

6.title: Chris Kattan

episode of.title: The Pauly Shore Podcast Show (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Pauly is kickin' it with comedian Chris Kattan who reflects on his experiences at Saturday Night Live his most controversial celebrity impression and what the second A in AA stands for. Also featuring comic Sandy Danto.

imdb.title: The Pauly Shore Podcast Show
akas: The Pauly Shore Podcast Show (United States)
plot: Actor and comedian Pauly Shore kicks back with a variety of famous friends for casual, off-the-cuff interviews.
